basics.name: Oskar Flores
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Software developer with more than 8+  years of experience.Outgoing and detail-oriented, I am proficient at building and maintaining professional software, and i like well clean and well designed software.

work.summary: Isetic is the company behind Zeus platform. Zeus is a cloud computing software that proceses data from industrial and factory machines in order to monitorize, check and predict machine and factory pieces status, Using Java 8 and Python
highlights: Design and build a Machine Learning pipeline (Data process and Api), for anomaly detection in IIot industrial engineering Machines
Build and desing a Distributed , message based, multi-threaded java data processors using Rabbit MQ and Amazon Kinesis
Java preocessors, make a heavy use of Redis for data sharing, and data access optimization
Build a backend processor, in java 8, to read data form PLC, aggregate it and save into AWS Dynamo NoSql database
Create and and several API using SpringBoot, using docker and deploying them into AWS container services
Using Ansible to create infrastructure as a code, and use it to provision EC2 instances to deploy other services and Lambda Functions

work.summary: Creation of a API based Recommended System, Deployed into a Mesos/Marathon environment. Design and implement a real time processing data using Apache Storm and Hbase as database, Using Java 8 , SpringBoot, Spark and Scala
highlights: Data form the real time Engine is processed with Scala/Spark pipeline
The real time processing service uses Kafka Queues to distribite the messages between the different pieces
The The recommended system is composed by diferent API done using SpringBoot and Docker
The project is developed using Scrum Methodology, in a CI/CD pipeline
Several metrics from different services are gathered into a Graphana/InfluxDb for system monitoring

work.summary: Migrate All on premise Server Architecture for VeInteractive to Cloud Based one
highlights: Moved more than 400 machines to Azure
A totally automatized Environment using Puppet and Azure ARM

work.summary: Analysis and evolutionary development of the integral platform of environmental management of the Basque government, integrated with PLATEA, the electronic processing platform of the Basque Government
highlights: Developed using Java 5, deployed in a Webpshere server, with Ejb2 and JSP for the view

work.summary: Developing different software solutions in this consulting company, with different technologies, mainly Java and C#
highlights: Jsp, Ejb2 and WebSphere as development stack
Working for different clients as Basque Health Service, Liberty Insurance or Iberdola
